Publishing Philosophy

Jidaisya strives to be a bridge connecting Chinese academic thought with the world. We focus on publishing authoritative academic works in the fields of modern and contemporary Chinese political thought, legal studies, and constitutional economics, providing in-depth and cutting-edge academic resources to readers and researchers worldwide.

Publishing Direction

  • • Political Thought Studies: Exploring modern Chinese political theory and practice
  • • Legal Studies: Focusing on judicial system reform and rule of law construction
  • • Constitutional Economics: Studying the interaction between market economy and constitutional systems
  • • Social Culture: Documenting contemporary Chinese social changes and cultural development

White Paper on Chinese Thought in the 21st Century

As our core publishing project, the "White Paper on Chinese Thought in the 21st Century" series aims to systematically document and disseminate important academic thought in contemporary China. We believe that every era has its unique intellectual value, and these ideas need to be completely and truthfully recorded and passed on.
